label: 下襲
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Worn beneath the outer garments in formal court dress (sokutai). Its distinguishing feature was a long tail, extending beyond the hem of the outermost robe (hō), which the wearer draped over the balustrade when he sat on a veranda. [束帯, 袍]
